dmca.title: Copyright violation report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Dannie Parker [mailto:dannie.parker@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2007 8:16 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright violation report


Hello
 
I wouldl like to report the webserver which is hosting the website
http://www.christiandl.com/.  It's whois records show that a server in
your datacenter is hosting this website. 
 
The website is a forum which contains links to various illegal downloads
for users which can freely register for an account on the forum.  This
website links to illegal software, music, videos, e-books, and more.
 
If this website's database is not taken down within 24 hours, we will be
forced to take further action and may file a lawsuit against ThePlanet
Hosting.  As agreeance of cooperation on your behalf, we wlil galdly
extend this to a maximum of 10 days before we file a lawsuit in the
Supreme Court of the United States against ThePlanet Hosting. 
 
Dannie Parker
Business Software Alliance (http://www.bsa.org/)
